mapper.select: select t.id, t.username, t.password, t.nickname, t.avatar, t.email, t.mobile, t.remark, t.sort_index, t.is_enable, t.is_system, t.is_delete, createUser.id, createUser.nickname, t.create_time, lastUpdateUser.id, lastUpdateUser.nickname, t.last_update_time, deleteUser.id, deleteUser.nickname, t.delete_time from system_user t left join system_user createUser on t.create_user_id = createUser.id left join system_user lastUpdateUser on t.last_update_user_id = lastUpdateUser.id left join system_user deleteUser on t.delete_user_id = deleteUser.id where t.is_delete = ${@cn.koala.mybatis.YesNo@NO.value} and t.username = #{username}
